sentences.english: His remarks about gardening were hardly to the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 他对园艺的一席话简直是文不对题。

sentences.english: What you said may be true enough,but it is beside the point.
sentences.chinese: 你说的也许很对，可是文不对题。
